snippet.title: Warface: Breakout – Launch Trailer | Available Now on PS4 and Xbox One
snippet.description:
Become the ultimate mercenary of tomorrow in Warface: Breakout, a tactical online first-person shooter where tight gunplay and strategic team cooperation define the high-stakes PvP experience. Engage in fierce gunfights, make split-second decisions and master a vast arsenal of weapons to outsmart your opponents and secure victory.

Warface: Breakout is now available digitally for PS4 and Xbox One.

Learn more: https://go.playbreakout.com/TV

Read all news on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playbreakout
Get exclusive info on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayBreakout
Have questions? Ask them on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Breakout_Game/
Watch us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrgZ_gT0iimRoNuaiFhIwMA
Have a chat with us in Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fXnfEmB
Check out awesome art on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/play.breakout/

P.S. Song : "Ultimate" by Denzel Curry
